column1: #Text=Bengbu ( 蚌埠 ; Bèngbù ; literally " Clam Wharf " or " Oyster Quay " ) is a prefecture-level city with a populati on of 3,469,700 ( including rural area ) in northern Anhui Province .

column1: #Text=The city is on the Jinghu Railway , with hourly direct trains from Beijing , Shanghai and other large cities .

#Text=Bengbu South Station is in the south of Donghai Avenue , Beijing-Shanghai high-speed rail to the first station , east China Central Station , one of the Beijing-Shanghai high-speed rail seven central hub station , while the high-speed railway linking Beijing and Taiwanco mussels passenger line .
#Text=The early stages of the Beijing-Shanghai high-speed rail operating speed of 300 km , the initial operation Bengbu to Nanjing can be reached in about 35 minutes .
#Text=Taxis start at ¥ 5 for 2.5 km , and ¥ 1.2 per km after that .
#Text=Bengbu is the birthplace of the Huagudeng Sizhou drama , has been declared the country and the world intangible cultural heritage .
#Text=Bengbu Museum ( 蚌埠市博物馆 ) , Civic Plaza , Donghai Avenue ( 东海大道市民广场 ) , ☏ +865522042312 .
#Text=9AM-5PM Tu-Sun ( Closed on Mondays and Public Holidays ) .
